'''Brian Sergent''' ([[29 December|December 29]], [[1959]]) played [[Ted Sandyman]] in the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|extended edition]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''. He also provided additional character voices in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]''. In ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'', he gave voice to the Spiders of Mirkwood along with Peter Vere-Jones.
